We are happy to announce that Quarto 1.3 has been released. You can grab the new version from <https://quarto.org/docs/download/>.

If you are ever wondering what version of Quarto you are using, a quick way to check on the command line is:

```{.bash filename="Terminal"}
quarto --version
```

We've previously blogged about some of the features of this release that we were most excited about:

* [Code Annotation](../2023-03-13-code-annotation)
* [Multi-format Publishing](../2023-03-15-multi-format)
* [Jupyter Notebook Cell Embedding](../2023-03-17-jupyter-cell-embedding)
* [Confluence Publishing](../2023-03-20-confluence)

You can read about some of the other highlights, as well as all the other changes in 1.3, in the [Release Notes]().
